Text: RE CHANGE OF TIME Trading Forms Group Meeting to discuss events of default language and termination provisions Tuesday October am Houston time Cc IMPORTANT NOTE Change of time for this meeting now to occur at am Houston time on Tuesday October Thanks so much Sandy Haldeman Senior Administrative Assistant to Carol St Clair Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB A Houston TX Telephone Fax Number email address Original Message From Haldeman Sandy Sent Thursday September AM To Haedicke Mark E Aronowitz Alan Sager Elizabeth Keller James Cook Mary Keohane Peter Boyd Justin Arap Sami Hodge Jeffrey T Smith Mike Evans Mark London Legal Cc Elbertson Janette Garcia Nita Wright Alice Wilson Pauline Miyakawa Mina Rozycki Joanne Subject CHANGE OF TIME Trading Forms Group Meeting to discuss events of default language and termination provisions Tuesday October am Houston time Conference Room C has been booked for Tuesday October at am for a onehour meeting of the Trading Forms Group to discuss vents of default and termination procedures Call in information for telephone participants Domestic CallIn Number International CallIn Number Access Code Please let me know as soon as possible if you will be able to participate in this meeting

CHANGE OF TIME AND LOCATION CLEC Program Featuring Andy Lipman as Speaker Friday October NEW TIME am and NEW CONFERENCE ROOM EB C Cc Sorry for the late notice of a change in tomorrows CLEC program featuring Andy Lipman of Swidler Berline Shereff Friedman LLP but Mr Lipman called today to ask if we might move our am program set for October to a later time of am In doing so we are moving the location for the am program to Conference Room EB C and lunch will be provided Please let me know as soon as possible this afternoon if you will be able to attend the program at the new time and location so that our luncheon order may be finalized Too please call me if you have any questions concerning this matter Thank you very much Sandy Haldeman Senior Administrative Assistant to W Lance Schuler Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB A Houston TX Telephone Fax Number email address

Trading Policy Meeting to Discuss Termination Procedures Wednesday October at am Houston time Conference Room ECNC Cc patriciao On Wednesday October at am Houston time in Conference Room ECNC there will be a onehour Trading Policy Meeting to discuss termination procedures Call in information is as follows Domestic CallIn Number International CallIn Number Access Code Thank you very much Sandy Haldeman Senior Administrative Assistant to Carol St Clair Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB A Houston TX Telephone Fax Number email address

Bankruptcy Issues Luncheon Meeting Guest Speaker Paul S Aronzon of Milbank Tweed Hadley McCloy LLP Rescheduled from September Cc Paul Aronzon will be making a videoconference presentation on Tuesday October at noon CDT This is the rescheduled presentation that was to have been made on September Lunch will be provided for the Houston participants so please email your response to this invitation as soon as possible so final luncheon arrangements may be made DIAL IN NUMBER Chairperson Lance Schuler Dial In Number Intl Dial In Number Access Code IMPORTANT NOTE TO LONDON OFFICE Please email either Shakira Hosein or DeMonica Lipscomb here at Enron in Houston regarding the London room location for videoconferencing purposes
